definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora/CITES
pinyin: Bin1 wei1 Ye3 sheng1 Dong4 Zhi2 wu4 zhong3 Guo2 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 濒危野生动植物种国际贸易公约

pinyin: ye3 sheng1 dong4 zhi2 wu4 yuan2

sentences.english: Phytosanitary, which shows the characteristics of both public goods and technical rampart, is a significant part of Negotiation on Agricultural Multilateral Trade.
sentences.chinese: 动植物检疫是农业多边贸易谈判的重要议题之一。

sentences.english: The northern Duars has dense vegetation and abundant wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 北部Duars有浓密的植被和丰富的野生动植物。

sentences.english: Oliver: Let's have a look at the natural history section.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，让我们去看一看博物馆里的动植物学展区。

sentences.english: Any arms， munitions, living plants, or animals?
sentences.chinese: 有武器弹药和活的动植物吗？

sentences.english: Defensins are peptidic components of the innate immune system of plants and animals.
sentences.chinese: 防御素是动植物先天免疫系统的主要成分。

sentences.english: Animal and vegetable pests propagate with extreme rapidity.
Kenyatta has single handedlydestroyed Africa's wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 肯雅塔一手摧毁了非洲的野生动植物。

sentences.english: After the cataclysms bugs will be in abundance, as dead tissue from both plants and animals is everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 灾变后动植物组织到处都是，因此昆虫会很多。

sentences.english: Zhalong is the home of a lot of plants and animals, including different kinds of birds.
sentences.chinese: 扎龙是包括不同鸟类在内的许多动植物的家。

sentences.english: Establish ing nature reserves is the most effective method for the in- site conservation of wild plants and animals.
sentences.chinese: 建立自然保护区是就地保护野生动植物的最有效措施。

sentences.english: A wildlife garden is open April to September only.
sentences.chinese: 野生动植物园只在四月至九月开放。

sentences.english: The protective color of some plants and animals changes with their surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 一些动植物的保护色会随环境的变化而变化。

sentences.english: Without rain, plants and animals would die of thirst.
sentences.chinese: 没有雨水，动植物就会干渴而死。

sentences.english: Snow lotus and snow cock belong to the national 2nd category protective animals with high value of medical function.
sentences.chinese: 雪莲雪鸡为国家二级保护动植物，其药用价值极高。

sentences.english: It showcases different fauna and flora from tropical to desert terrain.
sentences.chinese: 它展示了从热带到沙漠地区各种不同的动植物。

sentences.english: As agriculture encroaches upon woodlands, plants and animals die out in droves due to loss of habitats.
sentences.chinese: 随着农业侵入林地，大批动植物因失去栖息地而灭绝。
